item.title: Project Endpoints
item.description: Project Endpoints We have a simple blog post application where a blog post goes through different stages in a distributed application. Easiest way to understand what’s going on is to talk about the endpoints we have. Add Blog Post The basic architecture behind this endpoint looks like this. We have an API Gateway that points to an AWS Lambda, which passes the incoming request to another lambda to process it through an SQS Queue.
